content.text:
Shoe Box Chords

Intro:
[ch]A#maj7[/ch] - [ch]C#maj7[/ch] - [ch]Fmaj7[/ch] - [ch]Dmaj7[/ch]


Verse 1:

[ch]Cm7[/ch]                   [ch]Cm7[/ch]
    We go many places    tilting favoured sky 
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                        [ch]Cm7[/ch]                  [ch]A#maj7[/ch] - [ch]F[/ch]
   Silence, blushes faded     in a little while 
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                         [ch]Cm7[/ch]
   I am standstill, smiling,   reeking muted tunes 
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                                         [ch]Cm7[/ch]
   All our stencils quiver; maps distorted skies, distorted skies


Chorus:
                        [ch]Eb[/ch]
Let’s please make no mistakes 
                                [ch]Dm7[/ch]
You breathe and lift life up in me 
                                 [ch]Cm7[/ch]                              [ch]A#maj7[/ch]
A tree, we’ll sit and branch our minds away in whitest streaks of green
                 [ch]Eb[/ch]            
Please make me recall a place we’ve once built 
           [ch]Dm7[/ch]                         [ch]Cm7[/ch]
And lived in a shoebox cluttered with furniture 
                       [ch]A#maj7[/ch]
And mismatched curtain shades 
                  [ch]Eb[/ch]
Park your heart inside with me and place those coupons 
          [ch]Dm7[/ch]              [ch]Cm7[/ch]
Leave the keys and a note away with thee 
                [ch]A#maj7[/ch] - [ch]C#maj7[/ch] - [ch]Fmaj7[/ch] - [ch]Dmaj7[/ch]
Don’t forget me please… 


Verse2:
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                      [ch]Cm7[/ch]
   I’ve forgotten beauty   rinsing in the dark 
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                      [ch]Cm7[/ch]                     [ch]A#maj7[/ch] - [ch]F[/ch] 
   An occasional whisper    carves the stars in place
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                      [ch]Cm7[/ch] 
   How in quiet moments     you are juggling smiles 
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                       [ch]Cm7[/ch]                     [ch]A#maj7[/ch] - [ch]F[/ch] 
   Cigarette smoke beckons   momentum’s swinging care 


Verse 3:
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                         [ch]Cm7[/ch] 
   Weary moonbeams splicing    disjointed happy thoughts 
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                               [ch]Cm7[/ch]                      [ch]A#maj7[/ch] - [ch]F[/ch] 
   Your laugh is locked in drawers    and vocal chords are drowned 
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                      [ch]Cm7[/ch] 
   Place us many places    scenic or grotesque 
[ch]Cm7[/ch]                                         [ch]Cm7[/ch]
   Living by the ocean, perfect or misplaced, or misplaced

Chorus:
                        [ch]Eb[/ch]
Let’s please make no mistakes 
                                [ch]Dm7[/ch]
You breathe and lift life up in me 
                                 [ch]Cm7[/ch]                              [ch]A#maj7[/ch]
A tree, we’ll sit and branch our minds away in whitest streaks of green
                 [ch]Eb[/ch]            
Please make me recall a place we’ve once built 
           [ch]Dm7[/ch]                         [ch]Cm7[/ch]
And lived in a shoebox cluttered with furniture 
                       [ch]A#maj7[/ch]
And mismatched curtain shades 
                  [ch]Eb[/ch]
Park your heart inside with me and place those coupons 
          [ch]Dm7[/ch]              [ch]Cm7[/ch]
Leave the keys and a note away with thee 
                [ch]A#maj7[/ch] - [ch]C#maj7[/ch] - [ch]Fmaj7[/ch] - [ch]Dmaj7[/ch]
Don’t forget me please…
